member.name: WTSSESSION_NOTIFICATION
member.summary: Provides information about the session change notification. A service receives this structure in itsHandlerEx function in response to a session change event.

member.name: WTSSESSION_NOTIFICATION.cbSize
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: WTSSESSION_NOTIFICATION.dwSessionId
member.summary: Session identifier that triggered the session change event.
